title: The Enlightening Adventures of Sue Kelly

story.text: Sue Kelly discovers a hidden meditation technique that grants her the ability to read minds during her morning routine.
Armed with her new skills, she overhears plans of a hidden crime during one of her meditation classes and decides to act.
By advising local authorities using her anonymously acquired insights, she helps to thwart a bank robbery without revealing her identity.
Sue spends the day refining her abilities and meditating longer, finding out she can subtly influence thoughts towards positive actions.
She prevents a school bullying incident by advising the potential bully about the consequences of their actions during a community seminar.
Sue helps her community by advising a local shelter on improving their outreach. She uses her influence to boost the morale and resolve of the volunteers.
Reflection day. Sue meditates on the impacts of her actions and prepares for a quiet life, ensuring her superhero acts remain secret.

ending: And so, Sue Kelly continues to nurture her community, one enlightened thought at a time.
moral: Great power and wisdom come with a quiet mind.
